cat.title: MATLAB Support Package for LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 Hardware

ref.name: legoev3
ref.purpose: Connection to LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 brick

ref.name: legoev3
ref.purpose: Connection to LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 brick

ref.name: writeLCD
ref.purpose: Write characters to LCD on EV3 brick

ref.name: clearLCD
ref.purpose: Clear characters from LCD on EV3 brick

ref.name: playTone
ref.purpose: Play tones from speaker on EV3 brick

ref.name: beep
ref.purpose: Play beep from speaker on EV3 brick

ref.name: readButton
ref.purpose: Read whether button on EV3 brick is being pressed

ref.name: writeStatusLight
ref.purpose: Control color and mode of status light on EV3 brick

ref.name: colorSensor
ref.purpose: Connection to color sensor

ref.name: readColor
ref.purpose: Read color of object in front of color sensor

ref.name: readLightIntensity
ref.purpose: Read intensity of light that reaches color sensor

ref.name: gyroSensor
ref.purpose: Connection to gyroscopic sensor

ref.name: readRotationAngle
ref.purpose: Read rotation angle from gyroscopic sensor

ref.name: readRotationRate
ref.purpose: Read rotation rate from gyroscopic sensor

ref.name: resetRotationAngle
ref.purpose: Reset rotation angle to zero

ref.name: irSensor
ref.purpose: Connection to infrared sensor

ref.name: readProximity
ref.purpose: Read distance from infrared sensor to object

ref.name: readBeaconProximity
ref.purpose: Read distance and heading from infrared sensor to beacon

ref.name: readBeaconButton
ref.purpose: Read number of pressed button on infrared beacon

ref.name: motor
ref.purpose: Connection to motor

ref.name: readRotation
ref.purpose: Read rotation from motor

ref.name: resetRotation
ref.purpose: Reset rotation count to zero

ref.name: start
ref.purpose: Start motor

ref.name: stop
ref.purpose: Stop motor

ref.name: sonicSensor
ref.purpose: Connection to ultrasonic sensor

ref.name: readDistance
ref.purpose: Read distance from ultrasonic sensor to object

ref.name: touchSensor
ref.purpose: Connection to touch sensor

ref.name: readTouch
ref.purpose: Read touch sensor value
